alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern St. Louis and northwestern Lake Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near White Iron Lake, to near Birch Lake, to 10 miles east of Babbitt, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winton around 720 PM CDT. Fall Lake around 725 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
